history.proof: unfold divide, is_ring in *. intros Hring. destruct Hring as [Hcomm [Hgroup [Hintern [Hassoc Hdist]]]]. split. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - split. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + left. qsimpl use: or_introl,eq_refl.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

In environment S : Set A : S -> Prop Add, Mult : S -> S -> S O, I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat Hcomm : commutativity S Add Hgroup : is_group S A Add O Opp Hintern : intern S A Mult Hassoc : associativity S Mult Hdist : distributivity S Add Mult Unable to unify "?x = ?x \\/ ?B" with "O = O".

original: unfold divide, is_ring in *. intros Hring. destruct Hring as [Hcomm [Hgroup [Hintern [Hassoc Hdist]]]]. unfold divide. split. - apply Hgroup. - split. + apply Hgroup. + left. apply (or_introl eq_refl).
